6.4. boing.gesture — Gesture recognition tools¶

Recognition algorithms and common utilities have been placed in separated submodules:

  • 6.4.1. boing.gesture.rubine — The Rubine’s recognition algorithm
  • 6.4.2. boing.gesture.utils — Recognizers’ common utilities
